verbose_text: " On page 37, we state " Avoca ASU, a combination of ASU and glucosamine sulfate, has been shown to suppress TNFalpha, IL1beta, COX2, iNOS, PGE2, NFkappaB activation and nitrite production in articular chondrocytes and monocytes / macrophages, reducing pain and inflammation in OA patients.
evidence: sulfate, has been shown to suppress TNFalpha, IL1beta, COX2, iNOS, PGE2, NFkappaB activation and nitrite
